subject: Le Mans Auto Race
Automobiles
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The world's most famous and grueling 24-hour endurance race takes place on the Circuit de la Sarthe in Le Mans, France, a track like no other in the world.
snippet: The world's most famous and grueling 24-hour endurance race takes place on the Circuit de la Sarthe in Le Mans, France, a track like no other in the world.
